info.title: Campaign API
info.description: API documentation for Campaign management system

get.summary: Get a paginated list of campaigns
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all campaigns. You can control the number of items per page using the per_page parameter.

post.description: Create a new campaign with the provided data. All required fields must be provided.

description.example: A promotional campaign for summer products

end_date.description: Campaign end date and time (must be after start_date)

items.example: The start date field is required.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific campaign by its ID.

put.description: Update an existing campaign. Only provided fields will be updated.

delete.description: Permanently delete a campaign by its ID.

get.description: Retrieve all campaigns that match the specified status.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query (searches in title, content, summary)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort field (_score for relevance, created_at for date)

get.description: Get filter options (available authors, sources, etc.).
